points.text: Founding Engineer: Spearheaded the complete development lifecycle of the project from conceptualization and architectural design to full-scale implementation and deployment.
Designed UI/UX prototypes for Europe News Global using Figma, ensuring alignment with brand guidelines and usability best practices.
Engineered reusable React components and dynamic pages, leveraging React Query (TanStack) for optimized frontend caching and reduced redundant API calls.
Developed a Flask backend in VSCode, designing RESTful APIs to integrate seamlessly with the React frontend for full-stack functionality.
Integrated AWS DynamoDB as the primary NoSQL database, enabling efficient data storage and retrieval for the application.
